t: Pantera Vinyl Records - Revolver
s: Pantera are a heavy metal band from Arlington, Texas, formed in the early 1980s. The band consists of vocalist Phil Anselmo, guitarist Dimebag Darrell, bassist Rex Brown, and drummer Vinnie Paul. They are widely regarded as one of the most influential metal bands of all time, and their music ...
